mapper.insert: insert into `role_menu`(`role_id`, `menu_id`, `deleted`) values (#{roleId}, #{menuId}, #{deleted}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE role_id = #{roleId}, menu_id = #{menuId}, deleted = #{deleted}
mapper.update: insert into `role_menu`(`role_id`, `menu_id`, `deleted`) values (#{roleId}, #{menuId}, #{deleted}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE role_id = #{roleId}, menu_id = #{menuId}, deleted = #{deleted}
mapper.select: select m.`menu_id`, m.`menu_name`, m.`menu_icon`, m.`menu_desc`, m.`href`, m.`target`, m.`permit`, m.`sort_value`, m.`opened`, m.`enabled`, m.`create_time`, m.`edit_time`, m.`upper_id`, m.`deleted` from `role_menu` as rm left join `menu` as m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where m.enabled = 1 and m.deleted = 0 and (m.`menu_type` = 1 or m.`menu_type` = 2) and ((rm.role_id = #{roleId} and rm.deleted = 0) or m.opened = 1)

select m.`permit` from `role_menu` as rm left join `menu` as m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where m.enabled = 1 and m.deleted = 0 and m.`menu_type` = 3 and rm.role_id = #{roleId} and rm.deleted = 0 and m.`permit` is not null and m.`permit` != ""
